Package io.atomix.core.collection

Interface AsyncDistributedCollection<E>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AsyncIterable<E>, AsyncPrimitive, DistributedPrimitive
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsyncDistributedList<E>, AsyncDistributedMultiset<E>, AsyncDistributedNavigableSet<E>, AsyncDistributedQueue<E>, AsyncDistributedSet<E>, AsyncDistributedSortedSet<E>
    public interface AsyncDistributedCollection<E>
extends AsyncPrimitive, AsyncIterable<E>
    Asynchronous distributed collection.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface io.atomix.primitive.DistributedPrimitive

        DEFAULT_OPERATION_TIMEOUT_MILLIS
